snippet.title: Susie 1.0 and Ralsei 1.2 Companion Mods [GZDOOM EXCLUSIVE]
snippet.description:
My Patreon!
https://www.patreon.com/itsmeveronica

You can download the Companion mods here!
https://www.moddb.com/games/doom-ii/addons/susienralsei
No. It won't run on Zandronum. I'm sorry.

I made a mistake! at 2:33 The mod is GMOTA, not Combined_Arms! I did showcase Combined_Arms in Ralsei V1.1 though

Susie's long awaited release is finally here! Along with Ralsei's update! Since the last update, Ralsei and along with Susie now have more idle and attack variations and some crossover interactions to make them feel even more alive! This time I tried HARDER to really make sure there are way less bugs so that you friends have a proper experience.

Like I said, there were some animations and stuff that weren't showcased in the video. Ralsei has some rare attack variations, and etc. 
I forgot to mention that the companions will also act more urgently as your health lowers. 
Ralsei has a secret behavior that's only triggered if you spawn a swarm of him.

Yes I might make a future update for this. I do have some features I was not able to get out here. I also have plans for cameo appearances for Lancer and Kris at best. I still don't consider making them as full companions since I'm still not convinced it's worth it.

Also at one point I did get help from Ganbare Lucifer with some sprites for Susie, but I ended up not using them because most of her animations don't have rotations. It'd be inconsistent if only one of them had an animation. Sorry.

I'll go more into detail on the state of this YouTube channel in my community posts.

Here are the links of the mods that were shown!
